info.name: LLP CRUD (with partners)
info.description: API endpoints for Limited Liability Partnership (LLP) module

request.description: Create a new LLP registration with partners. The partners array must contain at least one partner.

item.name: Update LLP Registration and Replace Partners

request.description: Update an LLP registration and replace all its partners. The existing partners will be deleted and new ones will be created. The partners array must contain at least one partner.
Get all LLP registrations for the current user with optional filtering and pagination. Each LLP registration includes its partners.
Get a specific LLP registration by ID with its partners. Regular users can only access their own registrations, while admins can access any registration.
